gbifrules 0.1.0
  • Reference

Function reference

Projects

Functions for managing annotation projects

make_project()
Make Project
get_project()
Get a project
update_project()
Update a project
delete_project()
Delete a project
add_project_member()
Add a new member to a project

Rules

Functions for creating and managing annotation rules

make_rule()
Create a new annotation rule
get_rule()
Get rules
delete_rule()
Delete a rule
support_rule()
Support a rule
contest_rule()
Contest a rule
rm_support_rule()
Remove support for a rule
rm_contest_rule()
Remove contest of a rule

Rule Comments

Functions for managing rule comments

make_rule_comment()
Make a comment on rule.
get_rule_comment()
Get comments on rule

Rulesets

Functions for managing rulesets

make_ruleset()
Make Ruleset
get_ruleset()
Get a ruleset.
update_ruleset()
Update a ruleset
delete_ruleset()
Delete a ruleset
add_ruleset_member()
Add a new member to a ruleset

Data Cleaning

Functions for applying rules to GBIF data

clean_download()
Clean a GBIF download of suspicious records using complex rules
